events.name: Dec/2014 - Open Space
events.description: We appreciate Barclays for generously sponsor their venue! =) Agenda 7:00pm - Food 7:30pm - Generate topics and schedule 8:00pm - Breakout to topic sessions 10:00pm - End We welcome contributions of drinks and snacks! =) What is Open Space? Open Space is a highly collaborative and self-organized meeting where the participants themselves create the agenda and make it happen on the spot. Some of the past topics includes: - Sharing stories of challenging a management - Kanban - how to get started? - Scrum Master career path - Salary transparency policy in organization - Open Agile adoption redux - Dependencies Management .NET - Big Bang or Baby Steps? - how to award bonuses? - Incentives and encouraging better engineering practices - Cost efficiency of scrum in agile Getting There Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 2 is just right above of Downtown station along Downtown Line (DT) .
events.location: Barclays, 10 Marina Boulevard, #23-01, Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 2, Singapore
